SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USP_USR_UMHS_BATCH_ENDDATEPHONE
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_USR_UMHS_BATCH_ENDDATEPHONE ( @ID uniqueidentifier ,@ENDDATE datetime ,@REASONCODEID uniqueidentifier = null ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ) as begin
set nocount on;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
update dbo.USR_UMHS_PHONE set ISPRIMARY=0 ,DONOTCALL = 1 ,ENDDATE=@ENDDATE ,DONOTCALLREASONCODEID=@REASONCODEID ,CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID ,DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE where ID=@ID end
